original_text: When he had almost reached the gate of the town, lots of people were coming out. They were carrying a dead man on a wooden board. They were taking him to bury him. His mother had no other sons and her husband was also dead. A large crowd of people from the town was going with her.
korean_text: 성문에 가까이 이르실 때에 사람들이 한 죽은 자를 메고 나오니 이는 한 어머니의 독자요 그의 어머니는 과부라 그 성의 많은 사람도 그와 함께 나오거늘

sentences.original_text: When he had almost reached the gate of the town
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 거의 마을 문에 도달했을 때

sentences.original_text: lots of people were coming out
They were carrying a dead man
They were taking him to bury him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 묻기 위해 데려가고 있었다

sentences.original_text: His mother had no other sons
and her husband was also dead
A large crowd of people from the town
